overview: Internationally acclaimed director Oeke Hoogendijk reconstructs the musical universe and dramatic life story of the legendary and controversial composer Karlheinz Stockhausen. Licht shows the creation of his magnum opus; the most radical opera cycle in history.
tagline: A reconstruction of the the musical universe and dramatic life story of the legendary and controversial composer Karlheinz Stockhausen.
title: Licht, Stockhausen's Legacy
